definition: stinky tofu/strong-smelling preserved beancurd/fig. rough exterior but lovable person
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
to eat tofu/(fig.) to flirt/to tease
mapo tofu/stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce
lit. knife mouth but heart of bean curd; sharp tongue concealing a caring heart
pinyin: dao1 zi5 zui3 ba5 , dou4 fu5 xin1

definition: to have a sharp tongue but a soft heart (idiom)
pinyin: dao1 zi5 zui3 , dou4 fu5 xin1

definition: hasty men don't get to eat hot tofu (idiom)/one just has to be patient/haste will ruin everything
pinyin: xin1 ji2 chi1 bu5 liao3 re4 dou4 fu5

definition: okara (i.e. soy pulp, a by-product of making soymilk or tofu)
jerry-built building project/lit. built on soybean dregs

sentences.english: Moreover, bean curd cheese cake is also wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 此外，用豆腐做成的奶酪蛋糕也是特棒的。

sentences.english: I love their Asian desserts, particularly the hot tofu with sweet ginger sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡他們的亞洲甜點，特別是甜薑汁熱豆腐。

sentences.english: Before being fermented, the white chunks of tofu are plump and pliant . How filling they look!
sentences.chinese: 泡製前的豆腐塊白鼓鼓的，富彈性，很有飽實感。

sentences.english: Tofu and mushrooms have their own unique flavours.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐和蘑菇有自己獨特的風味。

sentences.english: Today, Fang Xingyu has handed over most of the workshop to her elder daughter.
sentences.chinese: 如今，方興玉把豆腐坊的大部分工作交給了大女兒。

sentences.english: Tofu is as good as medicine for lowing cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 豆腐是一種類似低膽固醇的良藥。

sentences.english: When a white mycelium develops, the cubes, are aged in salted rice wine.
sentences.chinese: 當白色菌絲形成後，豆腐塊被放在鹹的米酒中成熟。

sentences.english: Thermal denaturation of soy proteins is a pre-requisite for tofu-gel formation.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白質的熱變性是製作豆腐形成凝膠的前提。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I can find the stinky tofu stand?
sentences.chinese: 你可以告訴我，哪裏可以找到臭豆腐攤嗎？

sentences.english: When you eat it like sliced torfu, it is albumen of egg boiled in tea.
sentences.chinese: 好似切片的豆腐乾，喫起來竟是茶葉蛋的蛋白。

sentences.english: Tofu pudding is a Chinese dessert made with an extra soft form of tofu.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐花是由特別嫩的豆腐做成的一種中國小喫。

sentences.english: Tofu pudding is a Chinese dessert made with an extra soft form of tofu.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐花是由特別嫩的豆腐做成的一種中國小喫。

sentences.english: Deep frying at high temperatures both wipes out the bacteria and turns the stinky tofu sweetly fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 高溫油炸既有殺菌效果，同時也能讓臭豆腐轉臭爲香。

sentences.english: Oh, I almost forgot about dried tofu.
I first visited Okutan's Kiyomizu branch almost 7 years ago in winter 2009.
sentences.chinese: 第一次造訪“湯豆腐奧丹”，是2009年冬天。

definition: tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
